name: Back To Square One
description:
Cute and relaxing 2D parkour gameplay for 2018 is officially available. 

Do you ever remember the 2D parkour games that you used to play? One single sense touch to move and collecting coins while you run? Now is the time to have it all in your mobile devices. 

Game Features:
-30+ cute emoji characters 
-Tap to roll and jump to move forward 
-Collect as many coins as you can at once
-Colorful levels change while running 

It’s an “Easy to start, challenging to master.” parkour game. Be careful, because once you stop running or fall, you’ll have to get back to square one. Let’s see how far you can get?

Pick up your favorite emoji character and start your amazing parkour adventure ASAP!
